site.description: This is the Eclipse update site for the g-Eclipse project.

category-def.name: g-Eclipse
category-def.label: g-Eclipse
category-def.description: This is the basic g-Eclipse feature that comes with middleware independent functionalities, i.e. the g-Eclipse core.

category-def.name: g-Eclipse Add-ons
category-def.label: g-Eclipse Add-ons
category-def.description: These features contain additional tools and features.

category-def.name: Middlewares
category-def.label: Middlewares
category-def.description: These are the middleware add-ons for g-Eclipse. If you would like to work on a specifiy middleware this is the place where you may find support for it.
